txt.en: You should defeat wolves in the areas around the refugee encampments, east and across the river from Dale.
DNT Defeat enemies in and around the camps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Aiding the Dispossessed: Wolves In Waiting
You should speak to Komúsi, who can be found in the Dorwinion camp, east and across the river from Dale.
DNT Defeat enemies in and around the camps

'I have heard troubling reports that the refugees of Rhûn are beset by wolves. I will not see the dispossessed left to die, especially through the inaction of leadership.\n\n'Travel out to their encampment and cull the wolves that harry them. Let them know that they are safe in our lands.'
Wolves still attack the Easterling refugees when they stray from their camps.
'I am glad the Queen Regent of Dale has not forgotten us or our plight. The wolves will fall back into the deep trees and not bother us, at least for a spell.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder].'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
